TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(object sender, SourceChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SourceChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SourceChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SourceChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void SourceChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SourceChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type SourceChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * SourceChangedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: The object where the event is raised, and the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the "SourceChanged" event on specific listener elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此委托表示的处理程序的"SourceChanged"事件未公开为公共[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]事件，这与最路由事件的情况相同。 相反，"SourceChanged"是保持私有的路由的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构，并直接路由。 因为它是直接路由，`sender`和<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Source%2A>在事件数据始终是相同的对象。 你可以添加和删除通过公共方法的事件本身的私有访问级别尽管此事件的处理程序<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.AddSourceChangedHandler%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource.RemoveSourceChangedHandler%2A>。
`sender`的事件时，将的派生的类<xref:System.Windows.PresentationSource>。
